source_note: State baseline derived from Nebraska DEE Solid Waste Management Program and municipal recycling services; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting of yard and food waste is encouraged; regulated under NDEE Compost Facility Guidelines.
organics.bin: Green waste bin or compost drop-off site.
organics.notes: Lincoln and Omaha operate yard waste composting programs.
provenance: Nebraska Department of Environment & Energy (NDEE) composting guidance

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes before recycling.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue recycling bin or community drop-off center.
paper_cardboard.notes: No waxed, wet, or food-soiled paper.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Glass drop-off bins (most cities do not allow glass in curbside recycling).
provenance: City of Omaha glass recycling drop-offs

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel/tin cans (empty and rinsed).
metal_containers.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.
metal_containers.notes: No pressurized or paint cans curbside.

plastics.guidance: Recycle plastic bottles, jugs, and tubs labeled #1â€“#2; acceptance of other types varies locally.
plastics.bin: Blue bin or drop-off (loose, not bagged).
plastics.notes: No plastic bags, film, or Styrofoam curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Nebraska does not have a statewide beverage container deposit law.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle in curbside or drop-off bin if accepted.
beverage_containers_crv.notes: No refund or deposit program in place.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through HHW programs or drop-offs.
household_batteries.notes: Avoid putting batteries in trash or blue bin.

e_waste.guidance: E-waste recycling available at local drop-offs or events; NDEE supports collection programs.
e_waste.bin: Take to e-waste recycler or event.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary; TVs and monitors may have fees.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film are not accepted curbside.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to retail store drop-off bins.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Keep film and wraps out of blue bins to reduce contamination.

bulky_items.guidance: Arrange large item pickup or drop off at transfer station or landfill.
bulky_items.bin: Not accepted in standard trash/recycling bins.
bulky_items.notes: Some municipalities offer free bulky pickup days.
provenance: Omaha and Lincoln bulky waste collection policies
